articles.description: Netherlands head coach Ronald Koeman is fuming over a controversial first-half penalty in his side’s 2-1 loss to England in the 2024 European Championship semifinals.

articles.title: US going to deploy long-range weapons, hypersonics, in Germany - Business Insider
articles.description: The plan to field new weapons in Europe comes as the war in Ukraine sheds light on the need for long-range strike capabilities.

articles.author: Passant Rabie
articles.title: Europe’s Long Awaited Ariane 6 Rocket Suffers Anomaly During Its Debut Flight - Gizmodo
articles.description: The Ariane 6 rocket's first launch faced a second stage anomaly, preventing planned deorbit, as Europe aims to regain access to space.
